headline: VZ Gains From Healthy Demand in Public Safety Domain: Will it Persist?
summary: Verizon teams with Tampa Police to deploy 950 5G-enabled devices, boosting its push into the growing public safety market.

headline: The Loyalty Penalty: Why Remaining Faithful To Your Favorite Companies Could Be Costing You
summary: Consumers have long been told that it pays to be faithful. If you stick with a company, the thinking goes, you'll eventually be rewarded with a discount, an upgrade, or a perk. That's not always how things play out, unfortunately. More often than not, sticking with a company long-term actually means you wind up paying more. Business Insider has termed this phenomenon the "loyalty penalty," and says that there's a high chance you're paying it. It's become normal for things to get more expensive o

headline: Meet 16 Ideal "Safer" September Dividend Dogs Of The S&P500
